fever,cough: You might have the flu. Rest and stay hydrated.
fever,headache: You might have a viral infection. Consult a healthcare professional.
cough,sore throat: You might have a common cold. Rest and drink warm fluids.
cough: You might have a common cold. Rest and stay hydrated.
headache: You might be experiencing a migraine. Consider pain relief and rest.
sore throat: You might have a throat infection. Gargle with warm salt water.
